question: Which among the following has never been an agenda of Financial Sector Reforms in India?
option1: Providing easy credit to all citizens with subsidies guaranteed
option2: Deregulation of the interest rate regime
option3: Enabling regulatory framework for effective supervision
answer: Providing easy credit to all citizens with subsidies guaranteed
explanation: The easy credit to all citizens with "subsidies guaranteed" can not be an agenda of financial sector reforms. Subsidies are provided to weaker sections of the society.
